name: Guardians (itch) (CosmiicFox)
description:
Guardians is a game where as forest guardian, you must act when you see something happening, being these:

  • Forest fires: Red lights
  • Illegal animal hunts: Purple lights
  • Deforestation: Blue lights

The forest is divided by 6 sectors. With 2 controls, one that reports the location and one that reports the issue, both buttons have to be pressed at the same time so the lights turn green again and the forest is once again safe.

This never endless game represents how these problems will always be re-occurring. You can become one of our planets guardians by acting when you see something. 

🌲                                          🌲                                      🌲                                     🌲

You taking action will prevent these issues from overtaking the forests, preserving the Fauna and Flora of our planet.

Game developed during the Meaningful Games - Game Jam Week in Universidade Lusofona.
